pageContext.description: Dented in the centre of blade and the blade has become rather bent and curved.
pageContext.patina: Dark  brown patina - lighter on one side.
pageContext.surface: Fairly smooth but rough where patina is chipped off.
pageContext.associations: Part of a Bronze Foundery Hoard which included Bars of Gold.
pageContext.publications: Arch. XV, 118,Ant. Journ. Vol. VIII, 1928., p. 40, Pl. XIII, Miss. L.F. Chitty
pageContext.collection: Society of Antiquaries (No. 5),Burlington House W.,Presernted by Rev. Malachy Hitchins, 1802,B49 (iii)
pageContext.remarks: NB: Miss Chitty suggests that this is really part of the Willow Moor Hoard, (see Ant. Jour. 1928).
